CustomField.description: Use this to send for eSignature directly from the Agreement page. The eSignature request will automatically include the recipients from the default recipient list/OR from the field defined under the custom setting field "Auto Select Recipient Field", and will automatically select the first attachment from the agreement's notes & attachment list.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this to send for eSignature directly from the Agreement page, by auto including the recipients from the default recipient list/OR from the field defined under the custom setting field "Auto Select Recipient Field", and auto selecting the first doc.
CustomField.label: One Click Send
